content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position (0, 1)), boiler (position (0, 2)), and offshore pump (position (0, 3))

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-28.5, -61.0)) and a furnace at position (-28.5, -60.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.5, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (-15.5, -49.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(0, 4)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (0, 5) and inserter at position (0, 6) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position (0, 7)) that connects the furnace at position (-28.5, -60.5) to the assembling machine at position (0, 5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to crafting limitations
- Check available resources and ensure you have the necessary components to craft items before attempting to craft.
